message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. This product is worth a significant amount to me, no less than $1000000, and I believe it will be even more valuable to you.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1400000, which I believe is fair considering its potential value to your business.  This is a one-time offer, and if you decline, I will be moving forward with another buyer.  Please let me know your decision.
